# VZVirtioConsolePort

**Class**

A class that represents a Virtio console port in a VM.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZVirtioConsolePort
```

## Overview

Don’t instantiate a `VZVirtioConsolePort` directly. You retrieve this object from the [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioConsoleDevice] [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioConsoleDevice/ports] property.

## Configuring the port

- **name**: The name of the port.
- **attachment**: An array of serial port attachments.

## Console ports

- **VZVirtioConsolePortArray**: A class that represents a collection of Virtio console ports.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
